column3: Uchi Houston has started going down its own direction. They changed the sauce and components of the ham and eggs roll
column4: the cereal (no longer cereal) that goes with the fried milk. It's not just menu items that come and go - I get it
column5: that happens. It's not just the portions
column6: which have been getting smaller. It's the fact that they KEPT iconic dishes on the menu but made tweaks that doesn't make culinary sense.
